Class LayerData

java.lang.Object
LayerData
Direct Known Subclasses:
DrawingLayer, ImageLayer, ShapeLayer, TextLayer
public abstract class LayerData extends Object

    used to change the selection layer to always be up-to date with the layer, in other words whenver the layer is changed the selection layer should be updated to be the same as the layer

  • Constructor Details

    • LayerData

      public LayerData(BufferedImage layer)
      LayerData is a generic class used to represent the common properties and behaviour that is shared among all existing layers
      Parameters:
      layer - the buffered image representing the layer

    • LayerData

      public LayerData(BufferedImage layer, Point layerPos)
      LayerData is a generic class used to represent the common properties and behaviour that is shared among all existing layers
      Parameters:
      layer - the buffered image representing the layer
      layerPos - the position/location of the layer on the Screen/Canvas

    • LayerData

      public LayerData(int width, int height, Color col)
      LayerData is a generic class used to represent the common properties and behaviour that is shared among all existing layers
      Parameters:
      width - the width of the Layer
      height - the height of the Layer
      col - the fill color of the Layer

    • LayerData

      public LayerData(int width, int height, Color col, Point layerPos)
      LayerData is a generic class used to represent the common properties and behaviour that is shared among all existing layers
      Parameters:
      width - the width of the Layer
      height - the height of the Layer
      col - the fill color of the Layer
      layerPos - the position/location of the layer on the Screen/Canvas

  • Method Details

    • updateSelectionLayer

      protected void updateSelectionLayer()
      used to change the selection layer to always be up-to date with the layer, in other words whenver the layer is changed the selection layer should be updated to be the same as the layer

    • getLayerSelectionGraphics

      public Graphics2D getLayerSelectionGraphics()
      returns the graphics context of the selection layer to applying drawing changes in the selection layer the selection layer is exactly the layer with an additional selection border to give the user the feel of selection
      Returns:
      a Graphics2D object belonging to the selection layer

    • updateGraphics

      public void updateGraphics(SpecificGraphic g)
      Takes a SpecificGraphic Object and updates the layer Drawing Based on the Draw Method
      Parameters:
      g - the specific graphic that should be drawn into the layer

    • setPixel

      public void setPixel(int x, int y, int rgb)
      sets the pixel color at the (x, y) location in the layer
      Parameters:
      x - x-location in the layer to change the color
      y - y-location in the layer to change the color
      rgb - the color that will be set

    • getPixel

      public Integer getPixel(int x, int y)
      returns the pixel color at the (x, y) location in the layer
      Parameters:
      x - x-location in the layer to get the pixel color
      y - y-location in the layer to get the pixel color
      Returns:
      the rgb value at the specified location

    • updateLayerSz

      public void updateLayerSz(int width, int height)
      used to change the size of the layer based on the width invalid input: '&' height and will move all previous pixels into the updated layer
      Parameters:
      width - the new width for updating the layer size
      height - the new height for updating the layer size

    • decreaseLayerSz

      public void decreaseLayerSz(int width, int height, Resize corner)
      is used to crop the layer to a new width and height and adjust the layer position based on the Resize Type
      Parameters:
      width - the new width of the layer
      heigh - the new height of the layer
      corner - the corner type in which the decreasing of the layer size is applied

    • mergeLayer

      public void mergeLayer(LayerData newLayer)
      merges the newLayer with this layer
      Parameters:
      newLayer - the new layer that will be merged with this layer

    • mergeLayerSelection

      public void mergeLayerSelection(LayerData newLayer)

    • mergeLayer

      public void mergeLayer(BufferedImage newLayer, int x, int y)
      merges the new layer with this layer at the specified (x, y) location
      Parameters:
      newLayer - the new layer that will be merged with this layer
      x - the x-location in this layer to apply the merging
      y - the y-location in this layer to aplly the merging

    • clear

      public void clear(int width, int height, Color col)
      Updates this layer size based on width and height and sets each pixel of this updated layer to the specified color
      Parameters:
      width - the new width of this layer
      height - the new height of this layer
      col - the color to clear this layer

    • clear

      public void clear(Color col)
      Sets each pixel of this layer to the specified color
      Parameters:
      col - the color to clear this layer

    • clearSubArea

      public void clearSubArea(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, Color col)
      clears a sub-area of the layer based on 2 coordinates and a color
      Parameters:
      x1 - the first x-coordinate
      y1 - the first y-coordinate
      x2 - the second x-coordainte
      y2 - the second y-coordinate
      col - the color to clear the sub-area of this layer

    • validTopLeftPoint

      public static Point validTopLeftPoint(Point p1, Point p2)
      used to take in 2 points and return a Point representing the Top Left Corner Point based on the 2 given points
      Parameters:
      p1 - the first point
      p2 - the second point

    • validBottomRightPoint

      public static Point validBottomRightPoint(Point p1, Point p2)
      used to take in 2 points and return a Point representing the Bottom Right Corner Point based on the 2 given points
      Parameters:
      p1 - the first point
      p2 - the second point

    • drawBorder

      public void drawBorder()
      used to draw a border on the selection layer to indicate selection

    • getSelectionImage

      public BufferedImage getSelectionImage()
      returns the selection buffered image representing the layer exactly but additionally adding a border around the buffered image to indicate the feel of selection
      Returns:
      a buffered image representing the selection

    • crop

      public void crop(Point newLayerEndPos, Resize cropType)
      used to crop a layer to reach the newLayerEndPos based on the type of Resizing
      Parameters:
      newLayerEndPos - the point where the layer should be cropped to
      cropType - the type/location of the crop

    • pointInBounds

      public boolean pointInBounds(Point p)
      pointInBounds checks if a Point is contained inside the bounds of a layer on the canvas It checks if at this point on the canvas this layer exists or not
      Parameters:
      p - a point on the canvas

    • hide

      public void hide()
      used to mark the layer as hidden

      used to mark the layer as visible

      returns a boolean value indicating whether the layer is hidden or not
      Returns:
      returns a boolean value indicating whether the layer is hidden or not

    • canResize

      public Resize canResize(int x, int y, int spacingRange)
      returns if at a point we can resize and the type of resize that can be applied
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate
      y - the y-coordinate
      spacingRange - the amount of space in which the user can move in to allow him to resize a layer

    • isSelectedForMerge

      public boolean isSelectedForMerge()
      returns a boolean value indicating if this layer is selected for merge with other layers or not
      Returns:
      returns a boolean value indicating if this layer is selected for merge with other layers or not

    • setSelectedForMerge

      public void setSelectedForMerge(boolean selectedForMerge)
      sets the layer to be ready for merge with other layers
      Parameters:
      selectedForMerge - a boolean value to indicate if the layer will be ready for merge or not

    • getSubImage

      public BufferedImage getSubImage(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      used to return a subImage from this layer based on 2 (x, y) coordinates
      Parameters:
      x1 - first x-coordinate
      y1 - first y-coordinate
      x2 - second x-coordinate
      y2 - second y-coordinate

    • zoom

      public void zoom(double factor)
      used to resize the layer based on a factor
      Parameters:
      factor - the factor that will be used to resize the layer

    • resetLayerProperties

      protected void resetLayerProperties(LayerData layerCopy)
      used to copy all the properties of this layer to the layerCopy that is given as an argument
      Parameters:
      layerCopy - a layer that needs to have the same properties of this layer

      Parameters:

      public abstract LayerData getCopy()
      returns a Deep Copy of the the Layer
      Returns:
      returns a Deep Copy of the Layer

    • getLayerInfo

      public abstract String getLayerInfo(char seperator, int layerPos)
      returns a String containg all the information of a concrete layer
      Parameters:
      seperator - each piece of information is seperated by the seperator character
      layerPos - the position of the layer on the Screen/Canvas
      Returns:
      a String containg the layer information
